item.title: Apprentice Pedantic (Level 3)
item.description: Use the flow extension to encourage an orderly and standardized branching model

item.description: Use the flow extension to encourage an orderly and standardized branching model

item.title: Apprentice Pedantic (Level 1)
item.description: Use the flow extension to encourage an orderly and standardized branching model

item.title: Blacksmith (Level 4)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Butcher (Level 4)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Apprentice Goldsmith (Level 1)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Apprentice Carpenter (Level 1)
item.description: Custom git hooks are installed which help catch issues before they are shared.

item.title: Apprentice Gipsy (Level 3)
item.description: Create, list, delete a tag signed with GPG using git tag

item.title: Master Historian (Level 7)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 3)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 3)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Architect (Level 5)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 7)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Collector (Level 1)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 2)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 2)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 1)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Architect (Level 3)
item.description: Added a submodule to a repository.

item.description: Create, list, delete a tag signed with GPG using git tag

item.title: Socialite (Level 6)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push
